dataset: LLM emergent ability sweep (Wei et al. inspired)
description: Approximate reproduction of Jason Wei's reported capability cliffs across PaLM model scales.

control_parameter.description: log10 parameter count derived from PaLM checkpoints (billions)

order_parameter.description: task success rate reconstructed from Wei's emergent ability plots

logistic_threshold.notes: Digitised PaLM traces currently sit 0.73 below the canonical 4.2 band; future dense sampling should test whether the universality window tightens.

power_law.description: Smooth null comparing σ(β(R-Θ)) to a param-count power law

partial_credit_metric.description: cross-entropy loss trace approximated from Wei's IPA transliteration example

observations.source: Jason Wei (2024) blog post on emergent ability arguments
observations.notes: Values digitised and smoothed to match logistic cliffs described in the blog.

impedance_context.description: Proxy impedance used when mapping PaLM scaling to UTF membranes

falsifiability: analysis/llm_beta_extractor.py exports ΔAIC against a power-law null and residual diagnostics per task.
repo_alignment: Docs/wei_integration.md links this dataset to the UTAC ←→ Wei bridge and enumerates follow-up falsification tests.
